Students participating in after-school activities or clubs can take the Late Bus home. The buses run on Tuesdays and Thursdays and leave campus at 3:15 p.m. and arrival times can vary based on ridership. The bus routes below are subject to change. If this happens, students will be notified accordingly.

LATE BUS A: MENDON, HOPEDALE, BELLINGHAM, BLACKSTONE & MILLVILLE

3:28 – DB Mart – Mendon

3:37 – Pop & Kork – Hopedale

3:43 – Town Common – Bellingham (Route 140 Entrance)

3:47 – S Main Street & Douglas Drive – Bellingham

4:07 – Blackstone Public Library

4:14 – Main Street & Central Street (Fire Station) – Millville

LATE BUS B: GRAFTON, MILLBURY & SUTTON

3:27 – Grafton Common Grafton

3:39 – Goretti's Millbury

3:46 – Heritage Plaza Grafton/Sutton

3:54 – Cumberland Farms S Grafton

3:18 – Upton Town Library – Upton

3:28 – Dairy Queen – Milford

3:31 – Woodland Elementary School – Milford

3:38 – First Congregational Church – Milford

3:40 – Milford Hospital

LATE BUS D: NORTHBRIDGE, UXBRIDGE, DOUGLAS & SUTTON

3:35 – CVS – Uxbridge

3:39 – Jumbo Donuts – Uxbridge

3:51 – Picket Fence Restaurant – Douglas

3:59 – Crossroad Variety – Sutton

4:09 – CoreMark – Whitinsville

Students participating in athletics can take the Sports Bus home after practice or a game. The buses run daily and leave campus at 5:45 p.m. and arrival times can vary based on ridership. The bus routes below are subject to change. If this happens, students will be notified accordingly.
